alert.note: Alert for Benson; Cavalier; Eddy; Ramsey; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 23 at 4:05PM CDT until April 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Towner, Cavalier, Benson, Ramsey and Eddy Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain is expected overnight, with precipitation expected to change to a wintry mix during the early hours Sunday before changing over to all snow Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
